reportFieldChanged.description: Triggers when a specific field in a BambooHR report changes for any employee.

props.name: reportId
props.description: The ID of the BambooHR report to monitor (e.g., "1", "2", etc.)

props.name: fieldToMonitor
props.description: The name of the field to watch for changes (e.g., "department", "jobTitle", "status")
